doc.after: The world's largest pizza was at the Norwood Pick 'n Pay hypermarket in Johannesburg, South Africa. According to the Guinness Book of Records the pizza was 37.4 meters (122Â feet 8Â inches) in diameter and was made using 500Â kg (1,100Â lb) of flour, 800Â kg (1,800Â lb) of cheese and 900Â kg (2,000Â lb) of tomato puree. This was accomplished on December 8, 1990.[34]
